name: Mtgox-php
body:
So this is the PHP source code to MtGox dont know how much use it is but there has to be some code that could be re-used and made into a better Gox site somehow by someone that has more knowledge about coding than me, plus more knowledge about security than MtGox did.

If you find it useful feel free to donate BTC to 1Htz4pAwb49ReSJF2aXBjwKmR7KXU1jTpq as I am not rich not even well off just putting this out there as I had it and someone will find it useful I am sure.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
